articles.description: "One Tree Hill" star Bevin Prince's husband, William Friend, died after being struck by lightning in North Carolina on Sunday.

articles.title: Ponniyin Selvan Teaser: Vikram, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan And Mani Ratnam's Magic In Epic Drama - NDTV Movies
articles.description: "The Cholas are coming," read the caption on the post shared by stars

New Delhi: The teaser of Mani Ratnam's magnum opus Ponniyin Selvan released on Friday and it is so worth the wait. The historical drama, based on Tamil … [+1173 chars]
